cab.content: /(This Document is the Property of His Britannic (Viajesty's GovernmentMFMORA.MDUM FOR THE WAR CABINETHP OF THE PRESS FOR PROPAGANDA PURPOSESI desire to support the views expressed by the Minister of Labour in his Memorandum on the use of the Local Press for propaganda.I believe it to be of vital importance that the steps he advocates should be taken with-out delay. I hope if this course is adopted that the smallest local papers will be included.W.H.L.COLONIAL OFFICE, 17,1,18.
